Class GiroPrototipo2

java.lang.Object
GiroPrototipo2
public class GiroPrototipo2 extends Object
Partial solution to the Giro de Rigo prototype 2 To compile javac -cp src src/ui/GiroPrototipo2.java -d bin To execute java -cp bin ui/GiroPrototipo2
Since:
march2024
